name: Ragdoll Survival
description:
Ragdoll Survival is a game which is so glitchy, it's funny. I know what you're saying, it is too glitchy to play! ! I know, I know it is like that in its current state. I'm developing a custom map, zombies, buildings, weapons. I am trying to make it more glitchy without having game features glitch.so you can laugh and have fun with your friends breaking a game.

We're not going to update or itch.io with updates for the game because we're only using itch.io for the community features and downloads! So come to our website.

- Duck Duck Studios
